Metadata.Title: CVE-2004-2779 affecting package libid3tag for versions less than 0.16.3-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2004-2779 affecting package libid3tag for versions less than 0.16.3-7. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libid3tag is earlier than 0.16.3-7, affected by CVE-2004-2779
